Class Appointment

java.lang.Object
hms.Appointments.Appointment
All Implemented Interfaces:
AppointmentDoctorView, AppointmentPatientView
public class Appointment extends Object implements AppointmentPatientView, AppointmentDoctorView
Represents an appointment in the hospital management system. An appointment can be viewed by both patients and doctors. It includes details such as appointment ID, doctor ID, patient ID, appointment date and time, status, and outcome record ID.

  • Constructor Details

    • Appointment

      public Appointment(String id, Optional<String> patientId, String doctorId, Optional<AppointmentStatus> status, LocalDateTime dateTime, Optional<String> outcomeRecordId)
      Constructs an Appointment with the specified details.
      Parameters:
      id - The unique identifier of the appointment.
      patientId - The optional identifier of the patient.
      doctorId - The identifier of the doctor.
      status - The optional status of the appointment.
      dateTime - The date and time of the appointment.
      outcomeRecordId - The optional identifier of the outcome record.
